article: I take the train to work every morning from a train station near my house. I can get to the station quite _ because there's a to the station. But in the summer, it can get quite smelly because of all the _ . So I always try to _ through it. Today I was trying to do so as usual _ something made me stop for a moment. I saw the most beautiful _ by an old woman walking in front of me with the help of a white _ . She was short and _ and had white hair. She was walking _ as each step took some effort. I hadn't specially noticed her at first , until she stopped near a . She slowly placed her walking stick _ the rubbish bin. Then she on it with her right hand. She bent down and reached for the rubbish. She clearly found it _ and it took her a while. She picked up some rubbish with her left hand and slowly straightened herself up again. All the while she used the rubbish bin to _ herself. She threw the rubbish inside the bin and then _ walking. It all took her great effort. There's no much rubbish and no one ever does _ about it. I was moved to _ this old woman make such a great effort to keep even a small part of it _ ! I haven't been able to _ thinking about that all day. I want to follow her example. I've decided to pick up rubbish of the _ if I meet from now on. I hope people will do the same as I do.
